title: #381 ‒ Alzheimer’s disease in women: how hormonal transitions impact the female brain, the role of HRT, genetics, and lifestyle on risk, and emerging diagnostics and therapies Lisa Mosconi, Ph.D.
summary: “What we and others have shown is that Alzheimer's is not a disease of old age. It's a disease of midlife with symptoms that start in old age.” —Lisa Mosconi The post #381 ‒ Alzheimer’s disease in women: how hormonal transitions impact the female brain, the role of HRT, genetics, and lifestyle on risk, and emerging diagnostics and therapies | Lisa Mosconi, Ph.D. appeared first on Peter Attia.
author: Peter Attia
